name: Battle of Wildlife
description:
Battle of the Wildlife

My project, 'Battle of the Wild' was created to raise awareness to the problem of excessive poaching which cause unreversed harms toward the ecosystem but also us. Due to these many reasons pointed above, this game has a great significance to me as a fierce and supporting wildlife protector. This game has for aim to represent the lack of power of animals towards the cruel acts of numerous poachers a.k.a illegal hunters. With the use of AR (Augmented Reality) , i am  digitally demonstrating to the public a simple, inoffensive  yet with an important meaning behind it. Basically, the concept is about a single animal (red panda in that case) being at the middle of the digital environment and is being surround by poachers who are shooting at it.

What is poaching?

Poaching is the illegal the hunting, killing or capturing of animals. They are slaughtered so that a single body part- like the tusks, pelts or T-bones can be illegally sold for huge sums of money.
